subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Chad Pennington, cut by the Jets after they signed Brett Favre, signed with the Miami Dolphins on Friday. Pennington, 32, expected to start for Miami, agreed to a deal worth $11.5 million over two years.
snippet: Chad Pennington, cut by the Jets after they signed Brett Favre, signed with the Miami Dolphins on Friday. Pennington, 32, expected to start for Miami, agreed to a deal worth $11.5 million over two years.
